t:type.name: TimeWindow
t:type.t:description: Represents a window of time during the week.

t:attribute.name: day
t:attribute.description: The days that this window begins. Maps to com.iris.common.time.TimeOfDay

t:attribute.name: startTime
t:attribute.description: Time of day to start window. 'HH:MM:SS'

t:attribute.name: durationSecs
t:attribute.description: Duration of the window in seconds.
